name: Summer Fruit Salad with Mint Dressing
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed seeded watermelon'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'sliced fresh strawberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'fresh peaches, cut into cubes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'nectarines, cut into cubes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red Anjou pear, cut into cubes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'seedless grapes, halved'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, juiced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'minced fresh mint (chocolate mint preferred)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, zested'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'honey (fireweed honey preferred)'}
steps: Combine watermelon, strawberries, peaches, nectarines, pear, and grapes in a large mixing bowl.. Whisk lemon juice, mint, lemon zest, and honey together in a small bowl; drizzle over the fruit mixture and toss to coat.. For best results, refrigerate the fruit salad for 1 hour before serving.

name: Citrus and Pomegranate Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pink or ruby-red grapefruits'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'navel oranges'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tangerines'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pomegranate arils'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate, undiluted'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mint sprigs for garnish (optional)'}
steps: Peel grapefruits, oranges, and tangerines with a serrated edge knife, being careful to remove the white pith.. Slice all citrus fruit crossways and remove any seeds. Evenly distribute slices amongst 4 salad plates. Sprinkle pomegranate arils evenly over each salad.. Stir together sour cream and undiluted lemonade concentrate in a small bowl for the dressing until smooth. Drizzle dressing over each salad. Garnish with mint sprigs.

name: Balsamic Grape and Walnut Salad

steps: In a medium serving bowl, combine the grapes, walnuts, onion, green onion, radishes and raisins. Toss with balsamic vinaigrette dressing just before serving.

Fold in pineapple, fruit cocktail, bananas, apple, coconut, pecans, raisins, and cherries. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

Make the fruit salads: Divide cantaloupe, papaya, apple, and banana among 4 individual bowls, arranging each fruit in its own section. Place strawberries in the center of each bowl. Sprinkle granola, raisins, and coconut over the bowls, then drizzle with the topping.

name: Winter Fruit Salad with Poppyseed Dressing

steps: Combine sugar, lemon juice, onion, mustard, and salt in a food processor or blender; process until well blended. With machine still running, add oil in a slow, steady stream until mixture is thick and smooth. Add poppy seeds, and process just a few seconds more to mix.. Toss romaine lettuce, shredded Swiss cheese, cashews, dried cranberries, apple, and pear together in a large serving bowl. Pour dressing over salad just before serving, and toss to coat.

name: These 7 Fruit Salad Recipes Are Perfect for Breakfasts
Cranberry Jell-O® Salad with Walnuts

Refrigerate until mixture is thickened to the consistency of egg whites, about 45 minutes. Mix apple and walnuts into gelatin, transfer to a serving dish or mold, and chill until firm, about 2 more hours.

name: Spicy Mango Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'mangos - peeled, seeded, and cubed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped shallots'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Place the mango cubes into a serving bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together the lime juice and olive oil. Season with red pepper flakes, cilantro, shallots, salt and pepper. Whisk briefly, then pour over the mangos. Stir to coat, then cover and refrigerate for about 30 minutes to blend the flavors before serving.

name: 100% Fruit "Cake"
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'seedless watermelon'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'strawberries, hulled and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cantaloupe - seeded, peeled, and sliced (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and sliced (Optional)'}
steps: To create the base tier of the cake, cut 3 slices of watermelon, 1 to 2 inches thick, crossways through the center of the melon. Trim the rind from the watermelon slices, and place the largest slice onto a cake plate. Alternate layering sliced strawberries, slices of cantaloupe, and slices of fresh pineapple; follow with the second-largest watermelon slice. Repeat once more to make a layered fruit stack that looks like a cake.. Thinly slice a few pieces of remaining melon and pineapple. With cookie cutters or a sharp knife, cut remaining fruit slices into decorative shapes. Decorate the cake tiers with the cut fruit shapes and remaining berries.. Refrigerate until serving time. To serve, slice the cake with a sharp knife, one wedge at a time, and set the wedge onto a plate.

name: Watermelon Salad with Feta
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white balsamic vinegar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'grape tomatoes, halved'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'arugula'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced red onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'watermelon, cubed'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'feta cheese, cut into 1/4-inch cubes'}
steps: Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and salt together in a large mixing bowl. Add tomatoes, arugula, and red onion; toss to coat. Gently stir in watermelon and feta cheese to serve.

name: Watermelon Cucumber Salad

steps: Mix red onion with lime juice in a bowl; set aside to marinate at least 10 minutes. Stir olive oil into mixture.. Toss watermelon, baby cucumbers, and feta cheese together in a large bowl. Pour red onion mixture over watermelon mixture; toss to coat. Sprinkle mint over the salad; toss.

name: Betsy's Mandarin Orange Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cider vinegar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced almonds'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'head', 'name': 'red leaf lettuce - rinsed, dried and torn'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped celery'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(11 ounce) cans', 'name': 'mandarin orange segments, drained'}
steps: In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the oil, vinegar, sugar, parsley, salt and pepper. Cover and shake well. Refrigerate until use.. In a medium saucepan over medium low heat, cook and stir the almonds and sugar until the sugar is melted and the almonds are coated. Remove from heat, cool, and break apart. Store at room temperature until ready to serve salad.. In a large bowl, toss together the lettuce, celery, oranges, almonds and dressing until evenly coated.

name: Red, White, and Blueberry Fruit Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'strawberries, hulled and quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'blueberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bananas'}
steps: Combine strawberries and blueberries in a large bowl. Sprinkle with sugar and lemon juice; toss lightly. Refrigerate until cold, at least 30 minutes.. About 30 minutes before serving, cut bananas into 3/4-inch-thick slices; toss with berries until evenly distributed.

name: Cranberry Jell-O Salad with Mandarin Oranges
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh cranberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'mandarin oranges, drained and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pecans'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple, drained'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(3 ounce) packages', 'name': 'cranberry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'boiling water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cold water'}
steps: Place cranberries, mandarin oranges, and pecans into a food processor and pulse several times to chop; process mixture until finely ground, about 30 seconds. Transfer mixture into a large bowl.. Mix pineapple, gelatin, and sugar in a separate bowl. Add boiling water and cold water and stir together until gelatin and sugar have dissolved.. Pour gelatin mixture into cranberry mixture and stir. Pour into a gelatin mold and refrigerate, 8 hours or overnight, before serving.

name: Watermelon Summer Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'halved, thinly sliced red onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'seeded, cubed watermelon'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crumbled feta cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pitted black olive halves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}
steps: Place the onion slices in a small bowl with the lime juice. The acid of the lime will mellow the flavor of the raw onion. Let stand for 10 minutes.. In a large bowl, combine the watermelon cubes, feta cheese, black olives, onions with the lime juice, and mint. Drizzle olive oil over it all, and toss to blend. Dig in and be prepared for a pleasant surprise!

name: Lazy Days Ambrosia
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(20 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple, undrained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3.4 ounce) package', 'name': 'instant vanilla pudding mix'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(15 ounce) cans', 'name': 'fruit cocktail, drained'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(11 ounce) cans', 'name': 'mandarin oranges, drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'name': 'frozen whipped topping, thawed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sweetened flaked coconut, or more to taste (Optional)'}
steps: Mix undrained pineapple and pudding mix together in a bowl until smooth, about 2 minutes. Fold in fruit cocktail and oranges, then fold in whipped topping. Sprinkle coconut over top. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.

name: Snow Grapes
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'seedless grapes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'cream cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}
steps: Remove grapes from stems, rinse, and set aside to dry. Mix together sour cream, cream cheese, white sugar, and vanilla in a large bowl. Fold in grapes until evenly coated. Chill overnight before serving.

name: Creamy Cranberry Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) package', 'name': 'cherry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'boiling water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) package', 'name': 'fresh cranberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple, drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped pecans'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'apple with peel, grated'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'cream cheese, softened'}
steps: Stir gelatin into boiling water in a mixing bowl until dissolved; let cool, about 5 minutes.. Meanwhile, process cranberries in a food processor until finely chopped. Add sugar and process until dissolved.. Pour cranberry mixture into cooled gelatin mixture. Stir in pineapple, pecans, orange juice, and apple until well combined. Cover and refrigerate for 8 hours to overnight.. When ready to serve, beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually beat in cream cheese.. Layer 1/2 of the chilled cranberry mixture in a glass serving dish. Spread whipped cream mixture over top, then finish with remaining cranberry mixture.

name: Christmas Cranberry Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'cranberries, finely ground'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(20 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple, drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'name': 'miniature marshmallows'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped pecans (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'whipped cream, beaten stiff'}
steps: Mix cranberries and sugar together in a bowl. Cover and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.. The next day, beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form.. Remove cranberries from the refrigerator. Mix in drained pineapple, marshmallows, pecans, and whipped cream until well combined. Pour into a 3-quart dish, cover, and refrigerate or freeze for at least 1 hour before serving.

name: Fruit Punch Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'green grapes, some halved and some whole'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh strawberries, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh peach, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh blueberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Granny Smith apple, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, juiced'}
steps: Mix together grapes, strawberries, peach, blueberries, and apple in a large bowl until well combined. Pour orange juice over fruit salad and stir.

name: Creamy Cranberry Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) package', 'name': 'fresh cranberries, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped apples'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'miniature marshmallows'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped pecans'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vanilla yogurt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip), thawed'}
steps: Combine chopped cranberries and sugar in a large, nonreactive bowl. Toss well. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours.. After 3 hours, stir apples, marshmallows, and pecans into cranberries. Combine yogurt and whipped topping; fold into cranberry salad. Serve immediately.

name: Sour Cream Cranberry Jell-O Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) can', 'name': 'jellied cranberry sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(3 ounce) packages', 'name': 'black cherry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O)'}, {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'boiling water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) carton', 'name': 'sour cream'}
steps: Mash jellied cranberry sauce in a 3-quart bowl. Stir in gelatin mix until thoroughly combined. Pour in boiling water; stir until gelatin has dissolved completely, about 3 minutes. Chill in the refrigerator until softly set, 2 to 3 hours.. Gently fold sour cream into chilled cranberry gelatin, leaving marbled streaks of sour cream and gelatin. Return to the refrigerator until firmly set, 4 hours to overnight. Store leftovers in the refrigerator.

name: Strawberry Mango Mesclun Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'canola oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'mixed salad greens'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'sweetened dried cranberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh strawberries, quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mango - peeled, seeded, and cubed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'slivered almonds'}
steps: Place sugar, oil, salt, and vinegar in a jar with a lid. Seal the jar and shake vigorously to mix.. In a large bowl, mix salad greens, sweetened dried cranberries, strawberries, mango, and onion. To serve, toss with dressing and sprinkle with almonds.

name: Avocado Watermelon Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed watermelon'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh baby spinach, torn'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'avocados - peeled, pitted, and diced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'walnut oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sweet paprika'}
steps: Combine watermelon, spinach, and avocados together in a bowl.. Whisk walnut oil, olive oil, lime juice, and paprika together in a bowl; pour over watermelon mixture. Toss to coat.

name: Autumn Apple Salad II
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tart green apples, cored and chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'blanched slivered almonds, toasted'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped dried cherries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'name': 'vanilla yogurt'}
steps: In a medium bowl, stir together the apples, almonds, cranberries, cherries and yogurt until evenly coated.

name: Avocado Pineapple Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cucumbers - peeled, seeded, and cubed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped red onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped serrano pepper'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'pineapple, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch dice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocado - peeled, pitted and diced'}
steps: Combine cucumbers, onion, serrano pepper, lime juice, and salt in a large bowl. Add pineapple and avocado; gently toss to combine.

name: Green Papaya Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Thai green chiles'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': None, 'name': 'green beans, cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'unripe papaya, peeled and cut into thin strips'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tomato, halved and seeded'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fish sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'palm sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'finely chopped unsalted, dry-roasted peanuts'}
steps: Combine garlic, chiles, and green beans in a mortar and pound roughly with the pestle. Add papaya and pound again to bruise the ingredients. Stir in fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar, then pound again. Add tomato and pound to combine. Stir in chopped peanuts and serve.

name: 15 Fall Fruit Salads That Celebrate Autumn Flavors
Green Apple Salad With Blueberries, Feta, and Walnuts
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'mixed salad greens such as leaf lettuce, endive, and radicchio'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'Granny Smith apple, cubed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crumbled feta cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'finely chopped green onions (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'blueberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Make the salad: Layer salad greens, apple cubes, walnuts, feta cheese, cranberries, and green onions in a large bowl.. Make the dressing: Combine vegetable oil, blueberries, olive oil, vinegar, and salt in a food processor or blender; pulse until well blended and smooth.. Pour dressing over salad and toss until well combined. Chill for 30 minutes before serving.

name: Watermelon and Blue Cheese Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'light olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white balsamic vinegar'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'watermelon, cut into bite-size cubes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh mint, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'crumbled blue cheese'}
steps: Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until smooth.. Mix watermelon, onion, and mint together in a separate bowl. Drizzle dressing over watermelon mixture and add blue cheese; toss well.

name: Mojito Fruit Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cubed seeded watermelon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'seedless grapes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cubed cantaloupe'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'hulled and quartered strawberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'peeled and quartered kiwi'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh blueberries'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}
steps: Mix the watermelon, grapes, cantaloupe, strawberries, and kiwi in a bowl with a tight-fitting lid; top with the blueberries.. Stir the mint, sugar, and lime juice together in a bowl, crushing the mint with the back of a spoon while mixing to extract flavors; pour over the fruit mixture. Seal the bowl with lid and refrigerate at least 1 hour.. Just before serving, gently flip the sealed bowl several times to coat the fruit with the dressing.

name: Autumn Waldorf Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pear, diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'apple, diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced celery (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raisins'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'ground cinnamon (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'ground nutmeg (Optional)'}
steps: Mix yogurt and brown sugar together in a bowl to make dressing.. Combine pear, apple, celery, raisins, cranberries, and walnuts in a bowl. Add dressing and toss well to combine. Sprinkle cinnamon and nutmeg on top.. Chill salad before serving, at least 30 minutes.

name: Fabulous Fruit Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red apple, cored and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'nectarine, pitted and sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'stalks', 'name': 'celery, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'name': 'nonfat lemon yogurt'}
steps: In a large bowl, combine red apple, Granny Smith apple, nectarine, celery, dried cranberries, and walnuts. Mix in yogurt. Chill until ready to serve.

name: Easy Frog Eye Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ⅓', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'acini di pepe pasta'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(20 ounce) can', 'name': 'pineapple chunks, drained and 1/4 cup juice reserved'}, {'quantity': '1 ⅓', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3.5 ounce) package', 'name': 'instant vanilla pudding mix'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'miniature marshmallows'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(11 ounce) cans', 'name': 'mandarin oranges, drained'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'frozen whipped topping, thawed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'flaked coconut'}
steps: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook acini de pepe in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes. Drain and rinse well with cold water.. Beat reserved pineapple juice, milk, sugar, and pudding mix together in a large bowl for about 2 minutes. Stir pineapple chunks, marshmallows, mandarin oranges, whipped topping, crushed pineapple, and coconut into the bowl with the juice mixture carefully. Cover and refrigerate at least 5 hours to overnight.

name: Summer Fruit Salad with Whipped Cream
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raspberry-flavored liqueur (such as Chambord'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'diced nectarines'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pitted and halved sweet cherries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced strawberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh raspberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh blueberries'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'raspberry-flavored liqueur (such as Chambord®)'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'toasted slivered almonds'}
steps: Stir water, 5 tablespoons sugar, 1/4 cup raspberry-flavored liqueur, and lemon juice together in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Bring mixture to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer, frequently stirring, until sugar dissolves completely, about 8 minutes. Set aside to cool.. Mix nectarines, cherries, strawberries, raspberries, and blueberries in a large bowl. Pour cooled sugar mixture over fruit and toss gently to coat.. Beat heavy whipping cream and 2 teaspoons sugar in a bowl with an electric hand mixer on high until stiff peaks form. Fold 1 teaspoon raspberry-flavored liqueur into whipped cream; spoon over fruit salad and sprinkle evenly with almonds.

name: Strawberry-Melon Summer Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon yogurt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'watermelon balls'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cantaloupe balls'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'halved fresh strawberries'}
steps: In a salad bowl, whisk together the lemon yogurt, honey, and lemon juice until smooth, and gently fold in the watermelon balls, cantaloupe balls, and strawberries. Toss to coat, and serve.

name: Best Apple Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'sweet apples, cored and cubed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green bell pepper, diced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped red onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'kidney beans, rinsed and drained'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white wine vinegar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: In a medium bowl, combine the apples, bell pepper, red onion and kidney beans. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vinegar, honey, mustard and pepper. Pour over the salad, and stir gently to coat.

name: Not Just for Brunch Fruit Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'green grapes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'sliced strawberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'sliced peaches'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange segments'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'peeled sliced kiwi'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange-flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau®)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}
steps: Mix grapes, strawberries, peaches, orange segments, and kiwi in a large bowl.. Whisk orange juice, orange-flavored liqueur, and sugar together in a bowl until sugar dissolves; gently stir into fruit until evenly coated. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate up to 8 hours.

name: Chef John's Waldorf Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'creme fraiche'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'finely chopped tarragon'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'crisp, sweet apples, cut into 1/2-inch cubes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cubed (1/4 inch) celery root, soaked briefly in cold water, drained well'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'quartered seedless green grapes'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted walnut pieces'}
steps: Whisk mayonnaise, creme fraiche, lemon juice, tarragon, sugar, salt, black pepper, and cayenne together in a bowl.. Place apples, celery root, grapes, and walnut pieces in a large bowl. Toss with about 1/2 cup of dressing. Add more dressing until salad components are well coated but not swimming in dressing. You might not need all the dressing.. Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate for up to 24 hours.

name: Tajin® Fruit Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'oranges, peeled and segmented'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mango, diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced fresh pineapple'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced jicama'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'cucumber, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'banana, sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chile-lime seasoning (such as Tajin®), or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh mint, or to taste (Optional)'}
steps: Cut orange segments in half and place in a bowl. Add mango, pineapple, jicama, cucumber, and banana. Add lime juice and sprinkle with chile-lime seasoning; toss to coat. Sprinkle with mint.

name: Watermelon, Cucumber, and Mint Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'seedless watermelon, cut into 1-inch cubes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cucumbers, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'leaves', 'name': 'fresh mint, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'apple cider vinegar'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'coarse salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crumbled feta cheese'}
steps: Gently mix watermelon, cucumbers, and mint in a large bowl. Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl. Drizzle over salad and gently toss to coat. Add feta cheese and gently mix.

name: Candy Apple Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple, with juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg, beaten'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'name': 'frozen whipped topping, thawed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'coarsely chopped dry roasted peanuts'}
steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, stir together the egg, flour, sugar, vinegar and pineapple. Cook until thick, about 6 minutes. Set aside until completely cool.. In a large serving bowl, fold together the pineapple mixture and whipped topping. Carefully mix in the apples and 1/2 cup of peanuts. Sprinkle the remaining nuts on the top.

name: Cucumber-Watermelon Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed seeded watermelon'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed English cucumber'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'balsamic vinegar'}
steps: Place the watermelon and cucumber cubes in a large bowl, and gently toss with the salt and sugar. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and toss to coat. Refrigerate for 15 minutes, then gently toss one last time before serving.

name: Family Tradition Watergate Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(8 ounce) containers', 'name': 'whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(20 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed pineapple, most of juice drained'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'name': 'miniature marshmallows, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(4 ounce) jar', 'name': 'maraschino cherries, drained (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(3 ounce) packages', 'name': 'instant pistachio pudding mix'}
steps: Gently combine whipped topping, pineapple with a little juice, marshmallows, cherries, and pudding mix in a large bowl until mixture is fluffy and thoroughly combined. Add more marshmallows if salad isn't fluffy enough. Chill in refrigerator for 1 hour before serving.

name: Fourth of July Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'blueberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced strawberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped watermelon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'red grapes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded coconut'}
steps: Combine blueberries, strawberries, watermelon, and grapes in a bowl; add coconut.
